events.message: We have received the application of John Doe for the software engineer position with great interest in his background.
Candidate John Doe's application has been categorized under Engineering due to his extensive developer experience.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to handle the recruitment process for the software engineer role.
The initial screening call with John Doe went very well; he demonstrated strong knowledge in software development.
John Doe responded positively to scheduling the technical interview and expressed excitement about the opportunity.
Technical interview has been scheduled for John Doe on May 5th to assess his software engineering and problem-solving skills.
John Doe completed the technical interview with impressive coding ability and system design knowledge.
HR interview has been scheduled for John Doe to discuss company culture and benefits on May 7th.
The HR interview went smoothly; John Doe showed strong alignment with company values and culture.
A formal offer has been proposed to John Doe including competitive salary and benefits for the software engineer position.
John Doe has acknowledged receipt of the offer and provided positive feedback, appreciating the compensation package.
John Doe has formally accepted the offer and is eager to start as a software engineer with our team.
Onboarding process for John Doe has started smoothly with orientation and initial training scheduled.
The hiring process for John Doe as software engineer is now officially closed with successful onboarding completed.
